Npcs.Name: George
Npcs.Greeting: Hello I have been looking for you

PathA.Prompt: What the hell have you done!! Now you gotta fix it
PathA.MsgA: Finally, now get out of my sight
PathA.MsgB: Maybe it wasn't so bad that you destroyed it
PathA.MsgC: Alright, go home you'll only make thing worse

Dialogs.MsgC: Wow that's a thing I would never ever do in my life. But it works, still
